info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 23 at 3:39PM EDT until August 23 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Florida, including the following county, Lee.
* WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 339 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Harlem Heights, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Iona, Villas, Pine Manor, San Carlos Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, East Dunbar, Three Oaks, Lovers Key State Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, St. James City, Matlacha, Buckingham, Pine Island Center and Whiskey Creek. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING
